attributes.action: Mp's should not be allowed to use their mobile telephones in the HOFC
attributes.additional_details:
It is impossible to effectively make amendments on such a broad scale, if one is more interested in what is taking place on their mobile. 
What could possibly be more important than our nation? 
Besides the fact it is their job. 
The simple facts state that phones are ruining our lives, taking away from the reality and displacing it with pixels. Now its broadcasted to us by those who are meant to be an example. Not exactly what I expect from our democracy and neither should you.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament should not be allowed to use their mobiles during the discussion of National policy. Mp's should be in The Houses of Common's to attentively listen and attempt to make amendments to new policy and raise issues which best represents their constituents.Are they really listening?
